label: 居箱
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Leader's box hel sutra rolls, texts of petitions, and other written materials needed by the main officiant (Dōshi) at a service (p. 556n). [導師]
